text: Sigriswil is a municipality in the administrative district of Thun in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. ==Villages== Aeschlen ob Gunten, Gunten, Meiersmaad, Merligen, Ringoldswil, Schwanden, Sigriswil, Tschingel ob Gunten, Wiler, Endorf, Reust and Justistal. ==Gallery== File:Sigriswil- BE.jpg|Sigriswil File:2011-07-23 Lago de Thun (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 289.JPG|Gunten File:Justistal01.JPG|Justistal File:2011-07-23 Lago de Thun (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 164.JPG|Merligen ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Sigriswil * Category:Municipalities in Thun
title: Sigriswil
